name: Double-Up Shark
text: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Shark" monster: you can add 1 card that specifically lists "Shark" in its text from your Deck to your hand. You can only use the effect of "Double-Up Shark" once per turn. If this card is used for the Xyz Summon of a WATER monster, it can be treated as a Level 4 or 5 monster.
